def bank::cheques::views::c_chequeCancellation (   request  ) 

User-Customer.

This method cancels the cheque if cheque number is valid, else: display the corresponding error message

Parameters:
request HttpRequest, the request created by user
Returns:
HTTPResponse Object,containing the name of the template which is to be rendered,and its context,which contains all the local variables of this function if cheque cancellation is successful,else: display error message
